\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
    \& {\ker p \cap \mathrm{im}(\alpha)} \& {\mathrm{im}(\alpha )} \& M \\
    0 \& {\ker p} \& P \& M \& 0
    \arrow[hook, from=1-2, to=1-3]
    \arrow[hook, from=1-2, to=2-2]
    \arrow["{\text{PO}}"{description}, draw=none, from=1-2, to=2-3]
    \arrow["{p|_{\mathrm{im}(\alpha)}}", dashed, two heads, from=1-3, to=1-4]
    \arrow[hook, from=1-3, to=2-3]
    \arrow[equals, from=1-4, to=2-4]
    \arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
    \arrow[hook, from=2-2, to=2-3]
    \arrow["p", two heads, from=2-3, to=2-4]
    \arrow[from=2-4, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
